translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for the Doctrinal Expositions

original: 12.10. Saññojanadukādi, Hetuduka🔽Nosaññojanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: saññojana duka ādi hetu duka  no saññojanam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: The Chapter on the Doctrinal Expositions in Pairs, Beginning with Fetters🔽With the exception of the fetters, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …🔽With the exception of the fetters, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …

original: Noganthaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nooghaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… noyogaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: nogantham na hetum dhammam paṭicca  pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  noogham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe noyogam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With the exception of the bonds, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …🔽With the exception of the floods, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …🔽With the exception of the hindrances, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nonīvaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.🔽Noparāmāsaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  no nīvaraṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta  hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava  na uparāmāsam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: With the exception of the ties, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …🔽With the exception of the clingings, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With the exception of the taints, not as root-cause, … (in brief) …
